name: Animal Explorer VR
description:
Description:

This game for them who want learn more about animals. In your big vintage house you can learn play or just explore for intrissting facts, watch video, find picture and walk around real 3D model. Play games that will improve your abilities.

Game overview: Explore:

In game you gonna meet animals with simple animation.

Learn and play:

Learn more about animals watching video and reading facts. When you Playing our mini games can you improve physical and mental capacity.

History:

You learn history of animal A to Z. We gonna show to us where you can find in real world. We give to you facts that you cant find in simple books. Get answer for mostly questioin.

Language:

In our plans add more than 10 languages every all text gonna translate, most video with subtitle.  Any video we record special for your languages. 

WARNING: 

This is only Concept. We Devolepment only 5 weeks and has tons of ideas to add in game.
